name: Shu Jam Fizz
recipeIngredient: Dash of Fee Brothers Peach Bitters

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse a Collins glass by swirling absinthe inside it, just enough to coat the sides; discard excess. Combine gin, jam, fennel syrup, lemon juice and bitters in a shaker with ice, and shake. Add ice to the prepared glass, and into that strain the contents of the shaker. Top with the soda, and serve.
